welcome.title: Welcome & Project Setup
welcome.description: Welcome to hayc! We get started right away by setting up your project and preparing everything for a smooth start

layout.title: Layout Selection
layout.description: We pick the best layout for your website, based on your preferences or examples you've shared with us

content.title: Content Collection & Organization
content.description: We organize the information you provide (via our form or email) and spread your content across the chosen layout

preview.title: First Demo Preview
preview.description: Your website draft is ready! You receive a private link to review and give us your feedback

feedback.title: Feedback & Refinements
feedback.description: We make any quick changes or adjustments based on your feedback to make sure everything feels right

launch.title: Website Launch
launch.description: Your website goes live and is ready for your business!

seo.title: SEO Optimization
seo.description: Search engine optimization and performance tuning

corporatePro.name: Horizon Studios
corporatePro.description: If Storytelling is what you want to convey through your Website, then you are in the right Layout!
corporatePro.fullDescription: Present your projects in a 'clean' way in a minimal environment so that they 'tie' everything together. Through the images, the visitor of your Website understands exactly what your work is and the history of each Project. So be sure to send us nice pictures.

ecommercePlus.name: YooGA
ecommercePlus.description: Create the perfect Website for your new Yoga Studio!
ecommercePlus.fullDescription: Inform your audience about the available courses so that everyone can book their appointments. This way you will save time on the phone and on questions.

portfolioMaster.name: Villa
portfolioMaster.description: Attract an audience to see the available properties on your Website like this Layout!
portfolioMaster.fullDescription: Fantastic way to advertise homes that are available to the public, either to buy or sell.

blogStandard.name: Golden Sands
blogStandard.description: Your Resort needs a good online presentation for interested summer guests!
blogStandard.fullDescription: Remember to include all important information regarding your rooms. The photos are the ones that will confirm what the texts say.Also we connect your company's Instagram to convey the vibe of your space and accommodations.

landingPro.name: PixelWave
landingPro.description: If you are Creative then this Layout is ideal for your business!
landingPro.fullDescription: Showcase your projects in a professional way and highlight the people behind them. Present your work with style and introduce the team that makes every success possible.

digitalHive.name: DigitalHive
digitalHive.description: A Digital Agency company must have a Website like this Layout!
digitalHive.fullDescription: Present your projects with a professional touch and unique design, while showcasing the trusted associates and companies you’ve worked with. Build credibility and inspire confidence in every new customer.

resort.name: Resort
resort.description: The ideal Layout for your hotel!
resort.fullDescription: Discover exceptional services designed to make your stay truly unforgettable, with images that reflect reality and highlight the quality we provide. Our luxurious suites are presented in every detail, giving you a complete picture before you even arrive. With an elegant presentation and clear information, we turn every interested visitor into a valued guest.

apex.name: Apex
apex.description: The ideal Layout for your hotel!
apex.fullDescription: Clear steps show how a construction company can present its process from concept to completion, making information accessible and structured. Customer feedback, completed projects, and success stories highlight reliability and quality, creating trust and inspiring confidence in future clients.

jane.name: Jane
jane.description: This Layout offers personal presentation with a fantastically special Design!
jane.fullDescription: A short introduction section allows visitors to quickly understand the background and story behind a business or individual. With a clean and responsive design, information is presented clearly and is easy to read on any device, ensuring a professional and user-friendly experience.

beauty.name: Beauty
beauty.description: Your business needs a Website to complete its online presence!
beauty.fullDescription: A pricelist section makes information easily accessible, reducing unnecessary inquiries and saving valuable time. Products can also be displayed clearly, giving clients confidence in the quality and safety of the materials being used.

evelinaDigital.name: Evelina Digital
evelinaDigital.description: Whether you're a Freelancer or have a steady job, this Layout is for showcasing your personal skills!
evelinaDigital.fullDescription: A personal projects section highlights past work with a dynamic design that combines visuals and supporting details, offering a clear view of contributions to each project. Alongside this, an expertise section showcases capabilities and achievements, creating a well-rounded presentation that inspires confidence and professionalism.

medicalCare.name: Medical Care
medicalCare.description: Take your practice one step further with a beautiful online presentation!
medicalCare.fullDescription: An easy communication section allows visitors to send inquiries or appointment requests directly, streamlining scheduling and follow-up. A trust section highlights customer feedback and testimonials, showcasing past experiences to convey reliability and build confidence.

ensurance.name: Ensurance
ensurance.description: When you offer insurance, you should also look safe. With this Layout you can achieve it!
ensurance.fullDescription: A services section presents offerings with a dynamic design, combining text, images, and interactive elements for a visually engaging experience. A fast communication section features a prominently placed form, making it easy for visitors to get in touch quickly and efficiently.

monica.name: Monica
monica.description: If your audience reads texts, then this Layout is for you!
monica.fullDescription: A power of speech section emphasizes the impact of well-crafted text to engage visitors and convey key messages effectively. A people’s power section showcases customer reviews and testimonials, formatted for readability to highlight real experiences and build credibility.

digitalPeak.name: Digital Peak
digitalPeak.description: If you have a Digital Agency, you must also have a very good online presentation!
digitalPeak.fullDescription: A services section highlights the key offerings of a business, using concise descriptions to capture the interest of visitors. A share knowledge section presents blogs or informative content, allowing expertise to be communicated clearly while engaging and educating the audience.

johnMiller.name: John Miller
johnMiller.description: To win a position that no one else can take, you have to do something that no one else is doing! Sophisticated presentation of your CV!
johnMiller.fullDescription: A projects section displays past work with images and descriptions, giving a clear overview of skills and experience. A features section emphasizes key tools, techniques, or attributes, using industry-relevant terms to demonstrate expertise and professionalism.

americanBarbershop.name: American Barbershop
americanBarbershop.description: Every barbershop need an Online Presentation!
americanBarbershop.fullDescription: An impressive menu section offers a unique browsing experience, making both the website and the business stand out. A services section clearly presents all offerings, ensuring visitors can easily see what is available.

healthCare.name: Health Care
healthCare.description: Give your customers the confidence they ask for!
healthCare.fullDescription: An expertise section highlights the medical staff and their specialized skills, giving visitors a clear sense of professionalism and trust. An authenticity section presents patient testimonials and reviews, emphasizing real experiences to reinforce credibility and confidence.

novaMed.name: NovaMed
novaMed.description: Your clinic needs an online presence!
novaMed.fullDescription: A view services section provides a clear overview of the services offered, helping visitors understand what the clinic provides. A reviews section showcases patient feedback, highlighting experiences that build trust with new visitors.

fotogency.name: Fotogency
fotogency.description: If photography is the element of your business, then you are in the right Layout!
fotogency.fullDescription: A dynamic menu section highlights creativity not only in the projects but also in the website’s navigation. A better view section allows visitors to explore projects in detail, gaining insight into the story and artistry behind each piece.

pureSpaceArchitects.name: PureSpace Architects
pureSpaceArchitects.description: Take your art Online and share it with the public!
pureSpaceArchitects.fullDescription: A unique design section provides a special presentation space that reflects the originality of each project. A talk about your projects section allows a brief description, sharing the story and inspiration behind the work with website visitors.

cakelicious.name: Cakelicious
cakelicious.description: If you create sweet recipes then it is very good to show them to your audience!
cakelicious.fullDescription: A creators section introduces the artisans behind your products, giving visitors a sense of connection and the story behind each creation. A sweets section showcases the range of offerings, with or without prices, helping visitors explore options and highlighting what makes your business unique.

festavaLayout.name: Festava Layout
festavaLayout.description: The best way to advertise your next Event!
festavaLayout.fullDescription: A schedule section provides a detailed program of events, keeping visitors informed about what’s coming next. A meet the artist section highlights key performers, with photos and relevant details, helping to attract and engage a wider audience.

kidKinder.name: KidKinder
kidKinder.description: Transparency is everything when it comes to children!
kidKinder.fullDescription: A schedule section provides updated information on classes and activities, helping visitors understand available options and plan accordingly. A teachers section introduces the staff, highlighting those who spend significant time with the children, giving parents confidence and peace of mind.

photoZone.name: PhotoZone
photoZone.description: If you think you have good photos then this is the best Layout for you.
photoZone.fullDescription: An impress section uses striking photos or videos as the first visual element, capturing attention right from the start. A mosaic section arranges images in a creative pattern, offering visitors an inspiring glimpse into the range and potential of the work.

nobleNosh.name: Noble Nosh
nobleNosh.description: Presenting food with pictures is what makes people want to buy it!
nobleNosh.fullDescription: A dynamic menu section showcases the full range of options, enhanced with photos that make the choices more appealing and engaging than plain text. A reviews section features customer feedback, helping new visitors gain trust and make confident dining decisions.

hexaDigital.name: Hexa Digital
hexaDigital.description: Start bringing customers to your company after you first have a good presentation!
hexaDigital.fullDescription: An easy navigation section ensures a seamless experience across devices, with a layout simple enough for any user to follow. An individual presentation section highlights projects one by one, providing details that help visitors appreciate the quality and impact of the work.

unityMentalHealth.name: Unity Mental Health
unityMentalHealth.description: Present your business in simple steps!
unityMentalHealth.fullDescription: An in simple steps section outlines the process for working with new clients, making it clear and easy to understand. A combination section brings together text and visuals to create a strong impression, encouraging visitors to engage further.

insure.name: Insure
insure.description: Give your customers the confidence they need by having a perfect Website!
insure.fullDescription: An earn the trust section highlights key numbers, such as customer base and team size, to capture visitor interest and build credibility. A services section presents available offerings and capabilities, with clear descriptions that create a strong first impression.

carServ.name: CarServ
carServ.description: Take your physical business one step further!
carServ.fullDescription: An everyone’s satisfaction section offers both an overview and detailed view of services, meeting the needs of visitors who want either a quick glance or more specific information. An authenticity section highlights real numbers and genuine expertise, reinforcing credibility even without large figures.

johnsonWilliams.name: Johnson Williams
johnsonWilliams.description: Special and impressive for the presentation of your works!
johnsonWilliams.fullDescription: An impressive presentation section showcases work in a visually striking way, helping it stand out to visitors. A quick access section connects directly to social media channels, making it easy for visitors to explore further and stay in touch..

mueller.name: Mueller
mueller.description: Give your customers solutions to build their digital presence!
mueller.fullDescription: A step-by-step section outlines the agency’s service process in clear phases—from discovery and strategy to execution and delivery—so visitors can quickly understand what to expect and the outcomes at each stage.A build-trust section highlights past collaborations, client logos, and short case summaries, demonstrating experience and reinforcing confidence in the agency’s capabilities.

eduMeeting.name: Edu Meeting
eduMeeting.description: Present your lessons in the best possible way for your students!
eduMeeting.fullDescription: A clear presentation section organizes courses or events by time and date, making it easy for both beginners and advanced learners to find the information they need. A get your business noticed section highlights reviews or popular courses, showcasing quality and encouraging visitors to enroll.

alexJohnson.name: Alex Johnson
alexJohnson.description: Personal portfolio with a special design for presenting your works!
alexJohnson.fullDescription: A unique tour section offers visitors an engaging browsing experience, reflecting originality in how projects are presented and completed. A special design section uses a distinct layout to showcase work in a memorable and visually appealing way.

eduWell.name: EduWell
eduWell.description: Present your courses in the best possible way to your students!
eduWell.fullDescription: A recommendation section highlights feedback from students and clients, emphasizing the value of past experiences to build trust. A list of courses section presents course categories clearly, with detailed information to help visitors fully understand the content and objectives of each lesson.

hero.title: Do you need website?
hero.subtitle: We create websites with all the features your business needs.

bookingAddon.title: Appointment Booking
bookingAddon.description: Let your customers schedule appointments or sessions online.

lmsAddon.title: LMS
lmsAddon.description: Turn your website into a learning platform. Upload videos, create lessons, and let users access your content.

multistepFormAddon.title: Smart Forms
multistepFormAddon.description: Collect any kind of information through beautiful, multistep forms — from client onboarding to service requests.

qrCodeAddon.title: Smart QR & Discount System
qrCodeAddon.description: Generate unique QR codes and send automated discount codes by email. Track redemptions and re-engage your customers.

realEstateAddon.title: Real Estate Listings
realEstateAddon.description: Display properties with images, location, and contact info. Perfect for realtors and property managers.

transportBookingAddon.title: Transport Request Form
transportBookingAddon.description: Let users enter pickup and drop-off locations, choose a vehicle, and submit a transport request — ideal for taxi, delivery, or shuttle services.

donationaddon.title: Donation System
donationaddon.description: Create a donation platform to raise funds for your cause. Includes secure payments and goal tracking.

onlinepayments.title: Online Payments
onlinepayments.description: Integrate secure online payments into your website. Supports credit cards, PayPal, and other payment methods.

cta.title: Find the best integrations
cta.description: Add any of these to your subscription and unlock new ways to grow faster, attract more customers, and boost revenue!

home.description: Transform your ideas into reality with our expert development team

projects.title: Our Projects
projects.subtitle: Check out some of our recent work

techStartInnovationHub.title: TechStart Innovation Hub
techStartInnovationHub.description: A modern platform for tech startups
techStartInnovationHub.fullDescription: TechStart Innovation Hub is a comprehensive platform designed to help tech startups streamline their operations, connect with investors, and scale their businesses effectively.
techStartInnovationHub.challenge: Tech startups needed a centralized platform to manage their operations and connect with potential investors while maintaining focus on their core business.
techStartInnovationHub.solution: We developed a user-friendly platform that combines essential business tools with networking capabilities, making it easier for startups to grow and succeed.

SkTransfer.title: SkTransfer
SkTransfer.fullDescription: SkTransfer is a comprehensive transfer and logistics platform that provides reliable transportation services for individuals and businesses across various sectors including food delivery, health services, personal transport, repairs, and entertainment logistics.
SkTransfer.challenge: Customers needed a reliable and efficient transfer service that could handle diverse logistics requirements across multiple industries.
SkTransfer.solution: We developed a user-friendly platform that connects customers with professional transfer services, ensuring timely and secure delivery across all service categories.

innovateCoPortal.title: InnovateCo Portal
innovateCoPortal.fullDescription: InnovateCo Portal is an enterprise-grade collaboration platform that enables teams to work together seamlessly, share resources, and track progress effectively.
innovateCoPortal.challenge: Large enterprises needed a secure and scalable platform to facilitate collaboration across different departments and locations.
innovateCoPortal.solution: We developed a comprehensive portal that brings together all collaboration tools in one place, improving productivity and communication across the organization.

techStartInnovationHub2.title: TechStart Innovation Hub
techStartInnovationHub2.description: A modern platform for tech startups
techStartInnovationHub2.fullDescription: TechStart Innovation Hub is a comprehensive platform designed to help tech startups streamline their operations, connect with investors, and scale their businesses effectively.
techStartInnovationHub2.challenge: Tech startups needed a centralized platform to manage their operations and connect with potential investors while maintaining focus on their core business.
techStartInnovationHub2.solution: We developed a user-friendly platform that combines essential business tools with networking capabilities, making it easier for startups to grow and succeed.

Vayo.title: Vayo
Vayo.fullDescription: Vayo is a cutting-edge business consulting platform that helps companies innovate and transform their operations through technology-driven solutions and expert guidance.
Vayo.challenge: Businesses needed expert guidance to navigate digital transformation and implement innovative solutions effectively.
Vayo.solution: We created a comprehensive consulting platform that provides businesses with the tools and expertise needed to drive innovation and achieve sustainable growth.

GoldenServices.title: Golden Services
GoldenServices.fullDescription: Golden Services is a premium platform dedicated to delivering exceptional service quality across various industries, focusing on customer satisfaction and service excellence.
GoldenServices.challenge: Service providers needed a platform to showcase their premium offerings and maintain consistent quality standards.
GoldenServices.solution: We developed a sophisticated platform that enables service providers to deliver premium experiences while maintaining the highest standards of quality and customer care.

DelliosGardenExperts.title: Dellios Garden Experts
DelliosGardenExperts.fullDescription: Dellios Garden Experts is a comprehensive gardening and landscaping platform that connects property owners with professional garden designers and maintenance specialists.
DelliosGardenExperts.challenge: Property owners needed access to professional gardening expertise and reliable maintenance services for their outdoor spaces.
DelliosGardenExperts.solution: We created a platform that brings together gardening experts and property owners, facilitating professional garden design, plant care, and landscaping services.

Ankologistics.title: Ankologistics
Ankologistics.fullDescription: Ankologistics is a comprehensive logistics platform that provides efficient transport and supply chain management solutions for businesses across various industries.
Ankologistics.challenge: Businesses needed a reliable logistics partner to handle their transport and supply chain requirements efficiently.
Ankologistics.solution: We developed a comprehensive logistics platform that streamlines transport operations and supply chain management for optimal efficiency.

MarianthiKatsouda.title: Marianthi Katsouda
MarianthiKatsouda.fullDescription: Marianthi Katsouda is a professional portfolio website showcasing expertise and services in a clean, modern design that highlights professional achievements and offerings.
MarianthiKatsouda.challenge: Creating a professional online presence that effectively showcases skills, experience, and services to potential clients.
MarianthiKatsouda.solution: We designed a sophisticated portfolio platform that elegantly presents professional credentials and services while maintaining a personal touch.

growthLabsAnalytics.challenge: Challenge: Building a comprehensive analytics platform
growthLabsAnalytics.description: Advanced analytics and business intelligence platform
growthLabsAnalytics.fullDescription: Complete analytics solution with real-time insights
growthLabsAnalytics.solution: Solution: Built a scalable analytics platform with custom dashboards
growthLabsAnalytics.title: Growth Labs Analytics

reviews.title: Our Reviews on Social Platforms
reviews.subtitle: See what our customers are saying about us on Facebook and Trustpilot

plans.title: Choose Your Plan
plans.subtitle: Find the perfect plan for your needs

features.zeroTransactionFee: 0% transactional fee on digital products / services selling

tooltips.coreFeatures: Essential website building tools including drag-and-drop editor, responsive templates, basic SEO tools, SSL certificates, and real-time analytics dashboard. Perfect for getting your business online quickly and professionally.
tooltips.basicSupport: Email support with guaranteed response within 24-48 hours. Our support team helps with technical issues, account questions, and basic troubleshooting. Includes access to our knowledge base and video tutorials.
tooltips.advancedFeatures: Premium tools including advanced SEO optimization, custom domain integration, enhanced security features, A/B testing capabilities, advanced analytics and custom CSS/HTML editing options.
tooltips.prioritySupport: Fast-track support with 4-8 hour response times via email and live chat during business hours. Priority queue placement for all technical issues, plus access to phone support and screen sharing sessions.
tooltips.allFeatures: Complete platform access including white-label solutions, API access for custom integrations, advanced automation tools, multi-language support, enterprise-grade security, and unlimited third-party integrations.
tooltips.dedicatedSupport: Personal account manager available 24/7 with direct phone line and email. Includes priority issue resolution, monthly strategy consultations, custom training sessions, and dedicated onboarding specialist.
tooltips.oneProject: Create and manage one complete website project with full access to all plan features. Includes domain hosting, SSL certificate, email accounts, and comprehensive analytics for your single business website.
tooltips.fiveProjects: Manage up to 5 different website projects simultaneously. Each project gets individual settings, analytics, domains, and customization options. Perfect for agencies or businesses with multiple brands.
tooltips.unlimitedProjects: Create and manage unlimited website projects with no restrictions. Ideal for agencies, developers, or large enterprises. Each project includes full features, individual analytics, and separate management dashboards.
tooltips.storage1gb: 1GB of secure cloud storage for your website files, images, documents, and media. Includes automatic backups, CDN delivery, and secure file management. Sufficient for most small business websites.
tooltips.storage10gb: 10GB of premium cloud storage with enhanced performance and security. Perfect for websites with rich media content, multiple product images, or extensive document libraries. Includes advanced backup options.
tooltips.unlimitedStorage: Unlimited secure cloud storage space for all your projects. Store unlimited images, videos, documents, and files. Includes enterprise-grade security, automatic backups, and global CDN for fast loading times.
tooltips.customDomain: Connect your own custom domain name (e.g., www.yourbusiness.com) to your website. Includes domain management tools, DNS configuration, and SSL certificate setup for professional branding.
tooltips.emailAccount: Professional email accounts using your domain name (e.g., info@yourbusiness.com). Includes spam filtering, email forwarding, autoresponders, and webmail access from any device.
tooltips.analytics: Basic website traffic tracking and visitor insights to understand your audience and website performance
tooltips.seo: Advanced search engine optimization tools including keyword research, meta tag management, sitemap generation, search console integration, and performance monitoring to improve your search rankings.
tooltips.ecommerce: Complete online store functionality with product catalog management, shopping cart, payment processing, inventory tracking, order management, and customer accounts. Supports multiple payment methods.
tooltips.ssl: Secure Socket Layer certificate for encrypted data transmission. Ensures your website displays the secure 'https' and padlock icon, building customer trust and improving search engine rankings.
tooltips.responsive: Your website automatically adapts to all screen sizes including smartphones, tablets, and desktops. Ensures optimal viewing experience across all devices with touch-friendly navigation.
tooltips.backup: Automatic daily backups of your entire website stored securely in the cloud. One-click restore functionality allows you to recover your site quickly in case of any issues or unwanted changes.
tooltips.template: Access to professional website templates and design tools. Customize layouts, colors, fonts, and content to match your brand identity with our intuitive design editor.
tooltips.hosting: Reliable web hosting service with 99.9% uptime guarantee. Includes fast loading speeds, global CDN, automatic scaling, and secure infrastructure to keep your website running smoothly.
tooltips.support: Professional customer support to help you with any questions or technical issues. Our team is here to ensure your website runs smoothly and meets your business needs.
tooltips.default: Get detailed information about this feature by contacting our support team. We're happy to explain how this feature can benefit your website and business goals.
tooltips.3Pages: Up to 3 professional web pages for your website, perfect for showcasing your business basics like home, about, and contact information
tooltips.1Email1GB: Professional email address using your domain name (e.g., info@yourbusiness.com) with 1GB storage capacity
tooltips.1ChangeMonth10Days: One content update or modification per month, completed within 10 business days
tooltips.basicSEO: Essential search engine optimization setup to help your website appear in Google search results with proper meta tags and basic optimization
tooltips.emailSupportGreekEnglish72hr: Professional customer support via email in both Greek and English languages, with 72-hour response time guarantee
tooltips.10Pages: Multi-page website with up to 10 different pages (Home, About, Services, Contact, etc.) for comprehensive business presence
tooltips.5Emails1GB: Five professional email accounts for your team members, each with 1GB storage capacity
tooltips.2ChangesMonth5Days: Two content updates or modifications per month, completed within 5 business days for faster response
tooltips.advanceSEO: Enhanced search engine optimization with keyword research and advanced on-page optimization techniques
tooltips.newsletter3000EmailsMonth: Email marketing capability to send newsletters to up to 3,000 subscribers monthly for customer engagement
tooltips.zeroTransactionFee: Sell your digital products or services directly through your website without any transaction fees - keep 100% of your earnings
tooltips.emailSupportGreekEnglish48hr: Professional customer support via email in both Greek and English languages, with 48-hour response time for faster assistance
tooltips.monthlyStrategyCall: One-on-one consultation call each month to discuss your business goals, website performance, and growth strategies
tooltips.phoneSupport: Direct phone support for immediate assistance and faster problem resolution during business hours
tooltips.50Pages: Extensive website with up to 50 pages for large businesses or content-rich sites
tooltips.20Emails1GB: Twenty professional email accounts for larger teams, each with 1GB storage capacity
tooltips.5ChangesMonth48h: Five content updates or modifications per month, completed within 48 hours for rapid response
tooltips.advancedAnalytics: Comprehensive website analytics including detailed visitor behavior, conversion tracking, and performance metrics
tooltips.advancedSEO: Premium SEO optimization including keyword research, competitor analysis, and ongoing optimization strategies
tooltips.newsletter10000EmailsMonth: Professional email marketing for up to 10,000 subscribers monthly for large-scale customer campaigns
tooltips.allAddOnsIncluded: Get all premium add-ons completely free with this plan - Booking System, LMS, Multistep Forms, QR Code Generator, Donation System, Online Payments, Real Estate Platform, and Transport Booking (worth over €400/month)

performance.title: Performance Guarantee
performance.description: Your website will load fast, look great on mobile — or we'll fix it free until it does.

moneyBack.title: 30-Day Money Back Guarantee
moneyBack.description: Not satisfied? Get a full refund within the first 30 days of your subscription — no questions asked.

uptime.title: Uptime Guarantee
uptime.description: Your website will stay online 99% of the time — or we cover your next month.

footer.aboutUsDescription: We provide cutting-edge subscription management solutions for modern businesses.

hero.subtitle: OUR GOAL FOR HAYC
hero.mainTitle: To deliver professional websites fast, continuously evolving with new features, and giving small and medium businesses the tools they need to grow

howItWorks.title: How does hayc work?
howItWorks.description: With hayc the process is simple: we start with a short call to understand your needs, you sign up and provide your content through an easy form, and we take care of everything.
howItWorks.guarantee: In just 15 days your website is online,
howItWorks.continuedDescription: with ongoing support and new features for as long as your subscription is active.

differences.title: What makes us different from others?

customCoded.title: Custom Coded Websites
customCoded.description: We are a team with professional programmers who know how to build websites from scratch.
customCoded.continuedDescription: like for example Wix, Squarespace and others. What we do, is we customize your own website, which can be connected to your work organization and your goals.

zeroRisk.title: 0% risk for your money
zeroRisk.description: We always try to do everything as perfectly as possible and continue working on it year after year. To do this, if you are not happy with any of your money, you can get it within the first 30 days. It is a risk-free business for you!

fullPayment.title: We want you to pay full price
fullPayment.description: We always want you to pay 100% of your price. We create strategic combined tools which will cost you thousands of euros to find and purchase for your business and we offer them at a very low cost.

reviewsProgram.title: Get Your Next Month FREE!
reviewsProgram.subtitle: Leave 3 reviews on Facebook, Trustpilot, and G2 to unlock a free month

step1.title: Step 1: Facebook Review
step1.description: Share your experience on our Facebook page. Your feedback helps other businesses discover HAYC!

step2.title: Step 2: Trustpilot Review
step2.description: Leave an honest review on Trustpilot to help build trust with potential customers.

step3.title: Step 3: G2 Review
step3.description: Leave a review on G2 to help other businesses discover our services. Use your work email for easier verification.

step4.title: Step 4: Verify Your Reviews
step4.description: After leaving all three reviews, click the button below to notify our team. The platforms must approve your reviews so they appear publicly. Once we can see them live, we'll credit your account within 24-48 hours. Remember to use your work email for easier verification!

success.title: Review check submitted successfully!
success.description: We'll verify your reviews and credit your account soon.

terms.title: Terms & Conditions:
terms.item1: All three reviews must be genuine and reflect your actual experience with HAYC
terms.item2: Reviews must be approved by the platforms and appear publicly for the reward to be granted
terms.item3: Fraudulent or duplicate reviews (including copied text or fake accounts) will void eligibility
terms.item4: Free month credit applies to your next billing cycle after verification
terms.item5: Offer limited to one free month per customer/account
terms.item6: Use your work email when possible to help platforms verify your reviews faster
terms.item7: Must have an active subscription to participate
terms.item8: HAYC reserves the right to modify or end this offer at any time without prior notice
terms.item9: The reward cannot be transferred, exchanged for cash, or combined with other offers

reviews.title: What Our Clients Say
reviews.subtitle: Real testimonials from businesses we've helped transform

review1.text: I had the opportunity to work with the www.hayc.gr team and I was completely satisfied with the quality, speed and excellent service they provide. I would like to express special thanks to Petros, who is an excellent professional. His consistency, kindness and willingness to help at every step made our collaboration not only effective but also enjoyable.
review1.author: MamaCoach

review2.text: Excellent cooperation with Hayc! Specifically, Petros was always willing to help me and solve several questions I had regarding the website he made for me! I recommend Hayc unreservedly since the result was even better than what I had in mind!
review2.author: Marianthi Katsouda

review3.text: A remarkable team of young professionals in the field of Website and Application Development.
review3.author: Takis Proios

review4.text: Hayc is fully professional that helped me by building a website for my business. Hayc was super quick and responsive to deliver the website in a really tight schedule and according to specifications. They started working on the project right from day zero, and completed the job successfully in less than 9 days. I highly recommend them to do business with and trust them for the quality of their work.
review4.author: Antonis Katsaros

review5.text: Excellent communication, great in their time table everything on time! I hope on a great corporation. Thanks!
review5.author: Verified Customer

review6.text: I am so blessed that I met Petros. I'm very happy with his work for my website. He is so professional that I couldn't believe it. Very very fast on his work and excellent in cooperation. I fully recommend him for website! Thanks a lot buddy.
review6.author: Happy Client

benefits.title: Why Choose HAYC for Your Website?
benefits.subtitle: We deliver results that matter for your business

benefit1.title: Fast Delivery in 15 Days
benefit1.description: From start to delivery in just 15 days. Your business will be online quickly without sacrificing quality.

benefit2.title: 100% Money-Back Guarantee
benefit2.description: When your website is delivered, if you're not satisfied within 30 days, we'll refund you — no risks, no questions.

benefit3.title: Built to Grow With You
benefit3.description: Your website isn't a one-off project. With our subscription model, it stays secure, fast, and ready to grow as your business grows.

benefit4.title: Stress-Free Website Creation
benefit4.description: No technical difficulties, no endless discussions. We handle the design, setup, and management so you can focus entirely on your business.

testimonialVideo.title: Watch what people saying
testimonialVideo.embedNote: Replace this with your actual video embed
testimonialVideo.quote: What people saying about their websites.
testimonialVideo.author: Penny Deligiannis - Agapi apostolopoulou

howItWorks.title: How We Create Your Perfect Website
howItWorks.subtitle: Our proven 4-step process guarantees your success

step1.title: Discovery Call
step1.description: We discuss your goals, show layouts and choose the best starting point.

step2.title: Sign Up & Form
step2.description: You subscribe and fill out a simple form with your content and preferences.

step3.title: Build & Customize
step3.description: We customize your selected layout, add your content and optimize for SEO and mobile.

step4.title: Launch in 15 Days
step4.description: Your website goes live with continuous updates, support and new features.

cta1.title: Ready to Get Your Website Live in Just 15 Days?
cta1.subtitle: Join dozens of businesses already growing with hayc. Stop wasting time and money on agencies — get a professional website, fast!

qualification.title: Is HAYC Right for Your Business?
qualification.subtitle: Answer a few quick questions to find out.
qualification.question1: Do you already have a website, or are we starting from scratch?
qualification.question2: What's your budget range for your online presence?
qualification.question3: When do you need your new website live?
qualification.question4: What's the #1 goal you want your website to achieve?
qualification.resultTitle: Perfect! You qualify for our services.
qualification.resultDescription: Based on these criteria, HAYC can help transform your business with a professional website that drives real results.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.question1: How long does it take to create a website?
faq.answer1: We deliver each website in just 15 business days after we receive your content and preferences. Fast, professional and stress-free.
faq.question2: What's included in the website package?
faq.answer2: Your subscription covers everything: a modern responsive website, SEO-friendly setup, contact forms, social media links, analytics, hosting and continuous updates. No hidden costs.
faq.answer3: You own the content, branding and your domain. The website itself is managed through your hayc subscription, which keeps it updated, secure and evolving with new features.
faq.answer4: Yes — unlike companies that give you a website and disappear, hayc includes hosting, security, updates and support in your subscription. No additional maintenance costs.
faq.question5: What happens if I need changes after launch?
faq.answer5: Each plan includes monthly change requests, so you can easily request updates without worrying about additional charges. Larger changes can be managed with add-ons.
faq.answer6: Yes, hosting is fully included. We manage it for you so your website stays fast, secure and always online.

final.title: Get Your Website Live in Just 15 Days
final.subtitle: Stop overpaying agencies or struggling with DIY builders. With hayc, you get a professional website — fast, simple, and built to grow with your business.
final.badges: 🔒 Risk-Free Guarantee • ⚡ Live in 15 Days • 🎯 Built for Growth
